Title: PNB Housing Finance share price falls over 3% post Q2 results but experts remain upbeat; here's what they say
Description: PNB Housing Finance share price hit its 52-week high of ₹784.40 on October 19 this year and its 52-week low of ₹340.68 on November 21 last year. From its 52-week low level, the stock has surged about 111 per cent, as of the stock's previous session close of ₹718.30.

This catapulted the bank's market capitalization beyond the ₹one lakh crore milestone in today's trade, making it the third PSU bank to achieve this significant feat.
